values:
<center>HAPPY SWEET SIXTEEN TO MEEEEE</CENTER>


and thank you everyone who wished me a happy birthday today!

<center>Someone on the otherside of the world is thinking and feeling the same way I am right now. I want to meet this person and talk to them because I bet this person and I would get along very well.</center>

Let's pretend were not needy. Let's pretend our hearts still beat. Let's pretend we fall in love tonight, Clumsy enough to fall for anything. We'll stumble on our words. We'll spill our guts on creaking bar stools, Below the neon blue. Low lives hiding in dives there's no feeling in drinking, sleeping with strangers. Ghosts passing through bedrooms unaware, A faint reflection on the barback's mirror, A face I never knew whispering, "Please dont be a stranger to me. Who are you if you're alone?" You're no good at pretending. All my plays have tragic endings, You wish I was a fairy tale. This frog will never change anything. Just pretend that you're in love, That scolding sun is bound to come up eventually. So who is it that whispers in your ear? A haunting voice blows in through the window. There's no feeling floating over beds, A needy pleading apparition Crying, "Who am I if I'm alone? I hardly exist at all. Let's pretend that we don't need anything anymore from anyone. I don't want to feel anything anymore let's just pretend, we'll live happily ever after."
complete

Things have been good lately I haven't updated in forever oops. 



<center> I want everyone to comment and tell me something I don't know about them...you can comment anonymously if you would like and I don't have IP adresses.<center/>

<center> *Note to self...do not procrastinate anymore!! Writing three essays in one day is no fun. On a good note..break was really good and relaxing. </center>


sometimes being spontaneous makes you go crazy.
<center> I wish I was somewhere else..somewhere I would have to travel hours to get to. </center>

<center> I'm so sad Barbie and Ken broke up...it makes me want to cry </center>



and uhhh Kevin is just so cool it makes me want to cry even more.

<center> Every tear that's fallen brings one thousand floods.
Paper cuts are leaving blood behind.
All the silent laughter ringing piercingly.
I blink making my eyes mine.
 </center>

Today= a very nice sleep and a relaxing day
tomorrow= a good day and if it's not..then i'll make it a good day :D

<center> But wait!










...nevermind this isn't fun anymore. </center> 



This weekend is Valentines Day...oh yay..eh not too bad when your going to hang out with amazing friends.
<center> Tonight was much fun...starbucks, running around outside, rite-aid, wendys, and Anns house! Plans worked out amazing. </center>

Tonight= a million things going on so I have no clue what i'm even doing yet. I guess I should find that out soon. Oh well


<center> Promises shattered
Answers don't come
Friends say goodbye
Plans come undone
Dreams get crushed
Lies get told
Words can turn cruel
Hearts can grow cold </center>

Isn't it the greatest feeling to go somewhere and see a person who is only there to see you?







Of course I haven't felt that in a while but who cares because today was a good day and hopefully there will be no school tomorrow.

You follow the footsteps echoes leading down a hall To a room, there's music playing Tiny bells with moving parts Here the shadows make things ugly an effect quite undesirable And The gold and yellow daylight Grows like ivy across the wall And it bounces off of the painted porcelain A tiny dancing doll Her body spins as she pirouettes Again the world suddenly seems small On an off-white, subtle morning You stretch your legs in the front seat The road has made a vacuum Where our voices used to be And you lay your head onto my shoulder Pour like water over me So if I just exist for the next ten minutes of this drive that would be fine And all these trees that line this curb would be rejoicing and alive Soon all the joy that pours from everything makes fountains of your eyes Because you finally understand the movement of a hand waving good-bye
Who else is in love with this song?

.



Other people are happy and that makes me happy




.

I hope I made the right choice....











and not the same mistake.

Don't you know I feel the darkness closing in I tried to be more than me And I gave til it all went away And we've only surrendered To the worst part of these winters that we've made
weeeeeee! good song

He smiled to the world,
But his heart fell below his pain.
He wanted only arms,
But he lied to himself again.

Closing doors and locking locks,
He looked inside himself.
Only to find, deep down fear.

Oh let me fall in two.
Let me fall in two.
Let me fall in two.

Wide as a river, and spread as thin,
What he could start no one would finish.
Bottled up brown entry they saw what they were,
Knowing not nothing, he was the only son.

Closing doors and locking locks,
He looked inside himself.
Only to find, seeping from his soul.

Let me fall in two.
Let me fall in two.
Let me fall in two.

What are you running from.
What are you running from.
What are you running from.
What are you running from.

He finds himself a way.
Only to want the world to find (But he finds himself a way),
You try to leave but there is nothing he can do.

Down cast eyes,
Scrutinize,
As to what the lead ball humming bird would not succumb.
To find what is gone you must burn what is dried,
And smell the essence of what remains inside.
But blackened thoughts,
Erase all that is past,
Before him,
Not knowing where he's coming.
So you shake him around,
And scream into his eyes,
That to drown in the water is to lie by his side.

Closing doors and locking locks,
He looked inside himself.
Only to find, seeping from his soul.

that is an amazing song.

Wow I'm really happy, but who knows how long it will last. Maybe a while or maybe only for a very short time.

Other people are happy.....very happy and they deserve it. It better work out too. (thats to you best buddy)





YAY!
Pretend and say it with a smile...it never fails

Last night went out with Laura, Lauren, and Evie. WE went and saw Big Fish. Good movie.

This week has been full of drama. It's scary...and sickening.

Last night was an adventure! Well Laura came over and we listened to records, took pictures, and were our normal stupid selves. After roasting marshmallows over a candle, we listened to some records. Then we just acted like idiots...what we do best. Then after all those crazy pictures...we felt the need for pretty ones (not very pretty though) The end

so sick of dreaming wake me up and do your worst to shut me up
~Vendetta Red

I just cleaned my room for hours. It looks the same which sucks considering I have been cleaning forever. It seems that everyone has started this year with very upsetting/horrible/boring first days of 2004. This year better be good, I think it's my turn to have a good year. Well at least I hope so. I hope that for everyone else too. (some people deserve it more than others though)

Whoa! Its the last day of 2003. Strange, yet good year. 








*Break out the alcohol*

Last night was so much fun, thanks Ant and Kate. Me, Kate, my brother, and James all had some interesting conversations in the car. And we all ate coffee beans to stay awake for the 9:30 show of Lord of the Rings that let out at 1:10am. Very fun night.
I don't think I have ever felt this alone before

Merry Christmas , It's the best time of the year

or so they say.

Last night was amazing. Went to the For Another Day show. Matt drove me and then from there I met up with Gabby, Brad, and some other people as well. The whole car ride I was made fun of by Matt and Phil, needless to say it was very funny. They played really good...glad I went. Then we drove home with an addition of Gabby because her parents are crazy. 

It's so wierd last night everyone told me who they have a crush on and stuff and it's wierd because when they asked me...I couldn't bring myself to say your name.


Really really great night. Hopefully tonight something will be going on.

Greatest thing all day..thought I'd share.

I'm sitting in my kitchen and I'm looking at a Chirstmas card and It was a picture of two little kids (friends of the family I guess)And they are sitting in this thing. So I go to my mom, "Why are they sitting in a giant egg?"...she looks at me in disgust and goes "You idiot they are sitting in a christmas ornament hanging on a tree!!" 

None the less...I felt kinda dumb after that.

Last night was amazing. Lake Avenue played at Empress so me and Laura went over there. When we got there it was freezing, but we got to sit in a car where it was warm. While in the car we were attacked (literally people were flinging themselves on the car) pretty funny. Then the doors finally opened so we went in. Firts couple of bands were alright. Hung out with a lot of people too many to name. Then Lake Avenue went on and besides the fact that everything went wrong they played amazing as usual. Then I danced with Barry because I looked over and he was dancing with some kid (don't remember who) so he asked me if I wanted to dance too...so I did, Very funny. Then Jen's dad drove us to her house and we hung out there for a while. Talked about really stupid shit. Then me and Laura got picked up and went home. Really good night in all

So today was eventful. Everyone seemed to be fighting with someone else. I didn't though..well not really. Then I was walking out to the buses with Gabby and I left for one second and I come back and her and kevin were kissing and i'm scarred for life now...its horrible. I ran on my bus and I can't look at her anymore hahaha. Thanks Gina Gabriella. Anyway thats my wonderful day so far. Now it's supposed to snow and  i'm very happy. Everyone hates the snow..I don't really it's a nice change. Pays to live in the middle of nowhere in the winter I guess.

Well today was a really good day. School went by fast and I was wide awake even though I only got about four hours of sleep! Well after school I forgot my key so I went to Laura's house and we played some "ghetto baseball". Ok picture this...We made her basement have four bases and we used a little novelty bat and a little stuffed ball thing...we rolled one pant leg up and pulled our hair up on the top of our heads. We played some of her brothers rap and we spoke some ghetto lingo. funny as hell. Then I had to go, but tomorrow will bring another day of ghetto baseball hopefully. Well thats all for right now...besdies these quizes and such.

Yesterday was Thanksgiving so we went to my aunts house. It wasn't soo bad, but it was pretty boring. I washed dishes for about an hour which sucked. When I got home I just sat online for a while..pretty exciting huh? But the night before me, gabby, diana, and jaqueline went to the empress because carmel sucks and there was nothing to do. Good bands it was fun. My friend is being stalked online by this kid...funny as hell if you ask me...poor thing. well thats it! yup.

~Amanda

Last night was really fun. Went to the intex show and saw pretty much everyone haha. We watched everyone perform and such...then we went outside on the track and just ran around. After it was over me, laura, robyn, jen, erin, andrew, jamie, dina, and her little brother went to the pizza place. We just hung out there for a while and then laura's mom picked me laura and robyn up. When I got home I layed down on the couch for a minute and fell right to sleep. Today I have to go some family crap, oh well. see everyone after I gain some sanity back.

Obviously you don't know how lucky you are, but I do.

Today was a really good day. No particular reason, it just was. I think part of it was the cup of coffee with way too much sugar in it at 6am this morning. I'm pleading temporary insomnia right now. weee!!

~Amanda

Today was uneventfull...fuuuun! I'm bored so I figured I would update. Today well...sucked it was so boring and I had to wear my glasses today because I had the worst headache from straining my eyes. Oh well. Then it just rained all day. I love the rain but it makes my days seem so much I dont know darker? But I ended up having a free half of 8th so I sat with lauren and joe and some other people for a while..better than class I guess. Then after school I went to robyns for a while and me and Laura hung out with her dog haha hes so cute. when I came home a fell asleep and now here I am..as you can see today really did suck haha.
~Amanda

Stubborn and hard-hearted. Ambitious and serious. Loves to teach and be taught. Always looking at people's flaws and weaknesses. Likes to criticize. Hardworking and productive. Smart, neat and organized. Sensitive and has deep thoughts. Knows how to make others happy. Quiet unless excited or tensed. Rather reserved. Highly attentive. Resistant to illnesses but prone to colds. Romantic but has difficulties expressing love. Loves children. Loyal. Has great social abilities yet easily jealous. Very stubborn and money cautious.

Laura sent it to me...most of it is freakishy true.

Pretty good night last night. This weekend should coninue to be good I hope.
